Tag 1: Testing

Name: Prior to testing the system shall be flushed of all foreign matter. Hydrostatic pressure test before backfilling, lagging & covering. Pipework with elastomeric or RRJ shall be backfilled leaving the joints exposed. Test as per AS 3500.4. 1500 KPA for 30 min. No leaks are acceptable. Some fixtures cannot handle 1500 KPA.These items are to be disconnected for the 1500 KPA test then reconnected and tested at their maximum operation pressure for 30 min
Tag 1: Prior to testing the system shall be flushed of all foreign matter. Hydrostatic pressure test before backfilling, lagging & covering. Pipework with elastomeric or RRJ shall be backfilled leaving the joints exposed. Test as per AS 3500.4. 1500 KPA for 30 min. No leaks are acceptable. Some fixtures cannot handle 1500 KPA.These items are to be disconnected for the 1500 KPA test then reconnected and tested at their maximum operation pressure for 30 min
